name: Ring Ring (Shawn Huang Fernandes)
description:
Ring ring! Reality is calling and you have to answer!

This puzzle platformer was made in 3 days for Mini Jame Gam #10

Special Object: Telephone

Theme: Reality is Breaking

Development Team:

Jozie Brajkovich: Concept, Design, & UX

Joseph Crump: Tech, Design

Yingying Huang Fernandes: Music & Composition

Shawn Huang Fernandes: Art , Tech, Design & SFX
